message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I can meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. How about we compromise at $180?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $180 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product. Can you consider that?
